name: Trigram Digital Services
body:
### Trigram Digital Services
Trigram Digital Services is an independent application security company, focused on providing services that will assist customers in assessing and improving software security controls.

### Application Security Consulting
Trigram's consulting services include reverse engineering compiled applications, source code audits, black box application assessments, mobile application assessments, and web application assessments. 

### Technical Training
Trigram is able to deliver onsite application assessment and secure development training courses. Custom course content can be developed, as needed.

### Security Research
Going beyond standard consulting services, Trigram is able to conduct long-term private security research projects. 

### Contact
For sales and other inquiries, please email inquiries\x40trigramdigital\x2enet.
